channel.title: Clifton Park's Best Real Estate Training
channel.description: Willie Miranda, a top Real Estate Agent in Clifton Park, shares his own internal real estate agent training for free. His Real Estate Training, Tips and Advice will help you sell more homes in less time.

item.title: Invest in Yourself
item.description: How do you stay on top of your priorities and keep your head from exploding? I’ll share three ways to assure you get the most out of your day, every day.

item.title: 4 Lead Generation Tips every Real Estate Agent Should be Using
item.description:
Has lead generation been a challenge for you this year?

I recently spoke to a group of great agents in Florida that had some of the same challenges. Here are the four lead generation tips I shared with them:

  1. Database
  2. Social Media
  3. Open Houses
  4. Geographic Farming

These four simple activities are easy to implement and will generate tons of leads for you in your business!

item.title: Best Daily Lead Generation Tip
item.description: I recently received a question asking “What is the best lead generation strategy?” Here’s my answer.

item.title: Interviewing Million Dollar Listing's Ryan Serhant
item.description:
Check out what Ryan Serhant has to say about the future of social media and the strategies for getting ahead in the real estate market.


Willie and his brother, Brian Miranda (General Manager/Associate Broker at Miranda Real Estate Group, Inc.), travel to NYC for the day to meet with Ryan Serhant, the star of Million Dollar Listing New York, and the author of “Sell It Like Serhant.”

Check out what Ryan has to say about the future of social media and the strategies for getting ahead in the real estate market.

Some of today’s takeaways include:

  • There are a lot of things you cannot control, but how hard you work isn’t one of them. 
  • Why “Personal Branding” is essential today to be successful in business.
  • Everything you do is a choice.
  • The person that cares the least holds the power.
